markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Metabolize Element](/Feats.aspx?ID=4346) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4340)

**Trigger**
You take damage from a foe's spell or magical ability with a trait of one of the elements in your elemental philosophy.

</column>

---

Your rapidly metabolize the elemental particles in your opponent's spell to gain a boost of energy. You gain the [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) condition until the end of your next turn. You can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.
name: Metabolize Element
